title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: Password Security Reminder
body:
Hello Skip,
 This is a reminder that all employees should be diligent about password security as there have been several instances of passwords left on notes on or around desks and workstations.
I do not need to remind you that this is a breach of company policy as well as a serious security risk and any employees, regardless of supervisory status found to be in violation will be subject to mandatory security training as well as a formal write-up if corrective actions are not taken as soon as possible.
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thanks,
 Michael Genslinger
Security Supervisor - LFCU
